pagename: Money making guide/Buying kegs of beer
title: Buying kegs of beer

properties.name: description
properties.value: Thora the Barkeep in the Rellekka Longhall Bar sells kegs of beer for 325-575 coins. Kegs of beer boost strength, but not enough to make them viable so they are a novelty item to collect. This method purchases them from the shop and deposits them via Peer the Seer in the Rellekka square. Approximately 100 inventories per hour are possible.

content:
Buying Kegs of beer
Requirements
Skills
None
Items
  • 1,000,000 recommended
  • Weight-reducing clothing
  • Stamina Potions (optional)
Quest
The Fremennik Trials
Other
  • If not using Peer the Seer to deposit, a quick transportation method is required:
  • Enchanted lyre(i) or
  • Fremennik sea boots 4 requiring elite Fremennik Diary
  • Teleport to house with poh in Rellekka
  • Moonclan Teleport or Waterbirth Teleport with a boat ride
Results
ProfitExperience gained
699,600 None
Inputs (850,000)Outputs (1,549,600)
850,000 × Coins (850,000)2,600 × Keg of beer (1,549,600)

Thora the Barkeep in the Rellekka Longhall Bar sells kegs of beer for 325-575 coins. Kegs of beer boost strength, but not enough to make them viable so they are a novelty item to collect. This method purchases them from the shop and deposits them via Peer the Seer in the Rellekka square. Approximately 100 inventories per hour are possible.
